        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 780x119
          text run at (0,0) width 499: "Here's the HTML test case, extracted from the Netcenter Address Book page. At "
          text run at (499,0) width 281: "the top of the address book is a \"tool bar\" with"
          text run at (0,20) width 120: "options like \"New,\" "
          text run at (119,20) width 438: "\"Directory,\" \"Sign-out,\" \"Customize,\" etc. These are areas in a client side "
          text run at (556,20) width 206: "image map. You should be able to"
          text run at (0,40) width 272: "click on these areas of the map, including the "
          text run at (272,40) width 476: "areas on the right side of the map. However, in NGLayout, the right side of the "
          text run at (747,40) width 27: "map"
          text run at (0,60) width 403: "isn't \"clickable\" -- the cursor doesn't change and the link cannot be "
          text run at (403,60) width 72: "\"activated.\" "
          text run at (475,60) width 297: "I think somewhere we're miscalculating where the"
          text run at (0,80) width 190: "imagemap's areas are, because "
          text run at (190,80) width 459: "the areas on the left still work, although clicking on them sometimes crashes. "
          text run at (649,80) width 79: "It's as though"
          text run at (0,100) width 341: "NGLayout thinks the Imagemap areas are located a few "
          text run at (341,100) width 155: "hundred pixels to the left. "
